description: Ride booking data containing information about ride bookings, cancellations, ratings, and payments

columns.name: BOOKING_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for each ride booking

columns.name: Booking Status
columns.description: Status of booking (Completed, Cancelled by Customer, Cancelled by Driver, etc.)

columns.name: VEHICLE_TYPE
columns.description: Type of vehicle (Go Mini, Go Sedan, Auto, eBike/Bike, UberXL, Premier Sedan)

columns.name: AVG_VTAT
columns.description: Average time for driver to reach pickup location (in minutes)

columns.name: AVG_CTAT
columns.description: Average trip duration from pickup to destination (in minutes)

columns.name: BOOKING_VALUE
columns.description: Total fare amount for the ride
columns.note: May contain string 'null' values - use TRY_CAST for numeric operations

columns.name: RIDE_DISTANCE
columns.description: Distance covered during the ride (in km)
columns.note: May contain string 'null' values - use TRY_CAST for numeric operations

columns.name: PAYMENT_METHOD
columns.description: Method used for payment (UPI, Cash, Credit Card, Uber Wallet, Debit Card)

data_quality_notes: Some numeric columns (BOOKING_VALUE, RIDE_DISTANCE) may contain string 'null' values instead of SQL NULL
Use TRY_CAST() function when performing numeric operations on potentially null columns

common_queries.daily_aggregation: SELECT DATE, COUNT(*) as total_bookings, AVG(TRY_CAST(BOOKING_VALUE AS DECIMAL(10,2))) as avg_booking_value FROM RIDEBOOKING GROUP BY DATE
common_queries.vehicle_type_analysis: SELECT VEHICLE_TYPE, COUNT(*) as bookings, AVG(TRY_CAST(RIDE_DISTANCE AS DECIMAL(10,2))) as avg_distance FROM RIDEBOOKING GROUP BY VEHICLE_TYPE
common_queries.cancellation_analysis: SELECT BOOKING_STATUS, COUNT(*) as count FROM RIDEBOOKING WHERE BOOKING_STATUS LIKE '%Cancel%' GROUP BY BOOKING_STATUS
